org.freeplane.core.util

Class FreeplaneVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freeplane.core.util.FreeplaneVersion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<FreeplaneVersion>

    public class FreeplaneVersion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<FreeplaneVersion>
    provides access to the current Freeplane version. In scripts use Controller.freeplaneVersion. For usage instructions see compareTo(FreeplaneVersion).

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(FreeplaneVersion o)
      Use it like this: FreeplaneVersion required = FreeplaneVersion.getVersion("1.0.38"); if (FreeplaneVersion.getVersion().compareTo(required) < 0) UITools.errorMessage("Freeplane version not supported" + " - update to at least " + required);
      int getMaj()

      java.lang.String numberToString()
      returns the version number only, e.g. "1.0.38".
      java.lang.String toString()
      returns the full version number, e.g. "1.0.38 rc".

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(FreeplaneVersion o)
        Use it like this: 
           FreeplaneVersion required = FreeplaneVersion.getVersion("1.0.38");
   if (FreeplaneVersion.getVersion().compareTo(required) < 0)
       UITools.errorMessage("Freeplane version not supported"
           + " - update to at least " + required);
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<FreeplaneVersion>
